sect1.title: &cloud; Deployment Guide Questionnaire
sect1.para: This document is a starting point for a &cloud; implementation. Use this document as a guide to help you prepare for deployment and as a worksheet as you discuss how to configure &cloud; for your environment.

The items below are discussed in greater detail in the &cloud; deployment guide. Reference the deployment guide for an understanding of the terms and clarification. Throughout the document you will see references to the section(s) in the deployment guide.
